item.description:
In the stylish summer action flick "Wanted" (based on the comic), see assassin's guild members Morgan Freeman and Angelina Jolie awaken slacker cubicle drone James McAvoy to the dormant, deadly powers he possesses for dispensing death and justice. Sure to have some nonsensical plot elements and perhaps a bit of over-the-top violence, it should be some interesting, somewhat mindless visual action.

Provided you can stay up late: we'll be going to see it at the CT Post Mall Cinema de Lux (link) in Milford at 9:20pm. The film is 1hr, 50min.

VIOLENCE: For those concerned the film might be violent, you can get precise text descriptions of what violence, gore, profanity, etc is in movie by clicking here.

RESERVED SEATING: It's showing in the Director's Hall, which is reserved seating. We'll probably buy tickets around 8:15, then may grab a quick bite. If you're coming, and you're someone I've met before, if you want me to get you a ticket together with us, I can do that and then you pay me when you show up. If I don't know you, you can Paypal me the ticket fee in advance. Or just link up with us and we'll all buy tickets together. Though Tue. 9:20 may be pretty dead so "seat jumping" may be easy to do.

PRE-PARTY: If anyone wants to get a quick bite before, we're probably up for that. Get in touch if you're interested and we'll see if we can make something happen.

HOST: Jason, cell 203-901-4957 (calling or texting is fine)

DIRECTIONS: 95 S to x39B, turn right at first entrance to mall. The theater is in the right end of the mall.

Parking is free.
item.name: Tue. 7/1 - Attack of the Drones
